definition: to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
lone/lonely
to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art

sentences.english: In order to transform their environment, he drew up the project with painstaking efforts.
sentences.chinese: 爲了改造環境，他苦心孤詣地制定了這個計劃。

sentences.english: However, the civilians' common knowledge is not conceived by the deliberately-pretended low key.
sentences.chinese: 可惜，老百姓的常識沒有被這種苦心孤詣的低調忽悠。

definition: to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to cherish the outmoded and preserve the outworn (idiom); conservative/stickler for tradition
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
authentic tradition/handed-down teachings or techniques
humanism
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
textual criticism
to comprehend (new things) by analogy
to contend
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to use up/to exhaust
